mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CONTACT_T(CONTACT_NO, NAME, TEL, EMAIL, ADDRESS, CREATED_AT) VALUES(CONTACT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{address}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.update: UPDATE CONTACT_T SET NAME = #{name}, TEL = #{tel}, EMAIL = #{email}, ADDRESS = #{address} WHERE CONTACT_NO = #{contactNo}
mapper.select: SELECT CONTACT_NO, NAME, TEL, EMAIL, ADDRESS, CREATED_AT FROM CONTACT_T ORDER BY CONTACT_NO ASC
SELECT CONTACT_NO, NAME, TEL, EMAIL, ADDRESS, CREATED_AT FROM CONTACT_T WHERE CONTACT_NO = #{contactNo}
